## roles.Api.update() method

Updates the role associated to the specified role id and returns the role.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
update(request: UpdateRoleRequest): Promise<Role>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [UpdateRoleRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.roles.updaterolerequest.md) | the update request. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Role](./smokeball-client-sdk.roles.role.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example


```
const request: UpdateRoleRequest = {
  id: '6f00a467-2d2d-40e2-944f-dff48d3617b4',
  // Specify the fields to update here.
  contactId: 'fd540bd6-f74c-45bf-b2ab-8107d0781a83',
};
const roles = await sdk.roles.update(request);
```
